price: Na bila ya shaka yeye amekwisha lipoteza kundi kubwa miongoni mwenu. Je, hamkuwa mkifikiri?
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَضَلَّ مِنكُمۡ جِبِلّٗا كَثِيرًاۖ أَفَلَمۡ تَكُونُواْ تَعۡقِلُونَ
footnotes: Na Shetani amewapotoa viumbe wengi kati yenu. Nyinyi mmeghafilika na hayo. Basi hamkuwa mkifikiri mlipo mt'ii yeye?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walaqad aḍalla minkum jibillan kathīran afalam takūnū taʿqilūna
